chapters.title: Chapter 6:  When Iron Melts
chapters.info: Lieutenant-General Turan, p. 113—Lieutenant-General in the Seanchan armies. He is stout, far from tall, and has a peaked nose. His close-cropped black hair is shaved two finger widths up each side of his head. He is a Blademaster. He sent reports to Galgan about the campaigns of Rodel Ituralde. His 100,000 troops were routed by Ituralde's forces, who were outnumbered two to one and possessed no damane. He remained proud and defiant, even in death.
